Cognitive test use standard battery occur preoperatively ( baseline ) , 4 week , 1 year surgery . Neuroimaging procedures surgery , 4 week 1 year surgery consist high-resolution anatomic , resting-state fMRI ( rs-fMRI ) magnetic resonance spectroscopy ( MRS ) sequence . To characterize leukocyte activation , whole blood drawn 5 time point : baseline ( prior surgery ) , circulatory arrest , 10 minute reperfusion , 10 minute CPB , 4 hour CPB .
